Uses of Class
RRPSS.MenuItem

  • Uses of MenuItem in RRPSS

    Subclasses of MenuItem in RRPSS
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Dessert
    Represents the menu items in the Dessert category.
    class 
    Drinks
    Represents menu items in the Drinks category.
    class 
    MainCourse
    Represents menu items in the Main Course category.
    class 
    PromotionSet
    Represents menu items in the Promotion Set category.
    Methods in RRPSS that return types with arguments of type MenuItem
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Map<MenuItem,​Integer>
    Order.getItems()
    Gets the HashMap representing items and the quantity ordered for the table.
    ArrayList<ArrayList<MenuItem>>
    Menu.getMenu()
    Gets the 2D ArrayList storing the menu items collection.
    Methods in RRPSS with parameters of type MenuItem
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Order.addItem​(MenuItem item, int quantity)
    Adds a MenuItem and its order quantity to the order.
    void
    Order.removeItem​(MenuItem item, int quantity)
    Decreases the order quantity of an ordered MenuItem.
    Method parameters in RRPSS with type arguments of type MenuItem
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    MenuUpdater.addMenuItem​(ArrayList<ArrayList<MenuItem>> menu)
    Adds a menu item to the menu.
    void
    MenuUpdater.editMenuItem​(ArrayList<ArrayList<MenuItem>> menu)
    Select a menu item from the menu to be edited.
    void
    OrderInvoice.printInvoice​(Map<MenuItem,​Integer> items, int OrderID, String server, boolean member)
    Prints the tab after the order is completed according to the customer's membership status.
    void
    OrderInvoice.printOrder​(Map<MenuItem,​Integer> items, int OrderID, String server)
    Prints out the items ordered with its quantity and total price.
    void
    MenuUpdater.removeMenuitem​(ArrayList<ArrayList<MenuItem>> menu)
    Select a menu item from the menu to be removed.
